Close Sidebar

Set Tracker Value

iOS 14 +

Notes

Sets the current value of the specified tracker

Syntax

updateNumberTracker(tracker: <#Object (Tracker)#>, value: <#Double#>, note: <#String (Allows Variables)#>)

Example

updateNumberTracker(tracker: Tracker(identifier: "abcde-f", displayString: "Hello World"), value: 42.5, note: ""This is some awesome progress!"")
